channel.title: CO2 on Novice Husband... among other things

item.title: Brewing suppliers in Chch
item.description: A convenient list of places to get brewing related things. I include online stores as they ship to Chch. This is not an exhaustive list. These are the ones that I use, or ones that I have been recommended.

item.title: Force Carbonation
item.description: Once kegged your beer needs to be carbonated. I am struggling to get the levels right, but for now these are the steps that I take.
